nodes.name: IF: All Required Fields Present?
nodes.notes: Checks if all required fields were successfully extracted. Routes to error handler if any fields are missing.

nodes.name: Territory Lookup - Placeholder
nodes.notes: PLACEHOLDER: Hardcoded territory availability check. Replace with actual API/database lookup logic.

nodes.name: IF: Territory Available?
nodes.notes: Routes workflow based on territory availability. YES branch sends approval, NO branch sends rejection and logs to AirTable.

parameters.subject: =RE: {{ $json.emailSubject }}
parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $json.consultantName }},

Thank you for your inquiry regarding franchise availability in {{ $json.city }}, {{ $json.state }} for your candidate {{ $json.prospectName }}.

✓ Good news!
We are pleased to inform you that this territory is currently available for franchise development.

We would be happy to discuss this opportunity further with your candidate. Please provide us with:

  • Candidate's contact information (phone and email)
  • Best times for an introductory call
  • Any preliminary questions they may have

Our franchise development team will reach out within 1-2 business days to begin the discovery process.

Best regards,

The Real Food Academy
Franchise Development Team

nodes.name: Gmail Send - YES Reply
nodes.notes: Sends professional 'YES' response when territory is available

parameters.subject: =RE: {{ $json.emailSubject }}
parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $json.consultantName }},

Thank you for your inquiry regarding franchise availability in {{ $json.city }}, {{ $json.state }} for your candidate {{ $json.prospectName }}.

Territory Status:
Unfortunately, this territory is not currently available for new franchise development.

We appreciate your interest in The Real Food Academy. While this specific location is not available, we may have opportunities in nearby territories that could interest your candidate.

If your candidate is open to exploring alternative locations within the region, please let us know and we'll be happy to provide information on available territories.

We will keep your inquiry on file and notify you if the situation changes in this market.

Best regards,

The Real Food Academy
Franchise Development Team

nodes.name: Gmail Send - NO Reply
nodes.notes: Sends professional 'NO' response when territory is unavailable

nodes.name: AirTable - Log NO Response
nodes.notes: Logs inquiry details to AirTable when territory is unavailable. IMPORTANT: Replace 'appXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' with your actual AirTable base ID

nodes.name: Gmail Label - Manual Review Required
nodes.notes: Flags email for manual review when required fields are missing or ambiguous. IMPORTANT: Create label in Gmail and replace Label_ZZZZZZZZ with actual label ID

nodes.name: AirTable - Log Error/Manual Review
nodes.notes: Logs emails with missing fields to AirTable for tracking and manual processing. IMPORTANT: Replace 'appXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' with your actual AirTable base ID

nodes.name: Label - Processed-Yes
nodes.notes: Marks email as processed with 'Processed-Yes' label for deduplication. IMPORTANT: Create label in Gmail and replace Label_XXXXXXXX with actual label ID

nodes.name: Label - Processed-No
nodes.notes: Marks email as processed with 'Processed-No' label for deduplication. IMPORTANT: Create label in Gmail and replace Label_YYYYYYYY with actual label ID

nodes.name: AirTable - Log YES Response
nodes.notes: Logs inquiry details to AirTable when territory is unavailable. IMPORTANT: Replace 'appXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' with your actual AirTable base ID

attributes.name: is_territory_check
attributes.description: =Is this email a territory check request?

attributes.name: prospect_first_name
attributes.description:
- Look for "First Name" + "Last Name" in Client's Information (FBA) and extract the first name
- Look for "Candidate:" line (IFPG) and extract the first name
- Look for "Prospect:" line (FranServe) and extract the first name
- Look for names in "client living in" context (TYN) and extract the first name
- Extract from form submissions (Direct)
- Leave BLANK if not provided

attributes.name: prospect_last_name
attributes.description:
- Look for "First Name" + "Last Name" in Client's Information (FBA) and extract the last name
- Look for "Candidate:" line (IFPG) and extract the last name
- Look for "Prospect:" line (FranServe) and extract the last name
- Look for names in "client living in" context (TYN) and extract the last name
- Extract from form submissions (Direct)
- Leave BLANK if not provided

attributes.name: prospect_email
attributes.description: - Look for "Prospect Email:" explicitly stated in   body (FranServe)      - Look for "Email:" in form submissions (Direct)      - DO NOT extract from message headers (From, To,   Reply-To, Delivered-To)      - DO NOT guess or infer      - Leave BLANK if not explicitly provided in body   content

attributes.name: prospect_phone
attributes.description: Look for a phone associated with the prospect or lead

nodes.name: -> Territory Checks
nodes.notes: Monitors Gmail for new unread emails matching franchise inquiry keywords in subject line

-------- Forwarded Message --------
Subject: TERRITORY CHECK for The Real Food Academy - Justin Dearing From Richard Ashe - Response Required
Date: Mon, 03 Nov 2025 22:32:41 +0000 (UTC)
From: Franchise Broker's Association <referrals@fbamembers.com>
Reply-To: Richard Ashe <rich@veteranfranchiseadvisers.com>
To: franchise@therealfoodacademy.com


.
   

New Pre-Registration / Territory Check for The Real Food Academy from FBA Broker Richard Ashe

The Real Food Academy are these territories available?

Let Richard Ashe know the status of these territories by clicking the buttons below.

Leander, TX 78641

Territory Notes:

Leander is a city in Williamson and Travis Counties, Texas, United States. Its population was 59,202 at the 2020 census and 87,511 at the 2024 census estimate. A suburb just north of Austin, and part of the Greater Austin metropolitan area, it was the fastest-growing city in the United States between 2018 and 2019.
ZIP codes: 78641, 78646
Population: 87,511 (2024)

Manage & Reply to Territory Availability

or mark all requested territories as

Available Alternate Territory Not Available

Click Here to begin a conversation on FBAMembers.com

  • Zip: 78641
